title: JRVP To Start Banning Holocaust Denial Posts
itunes:title: JRVP To Start Banning Holocaust Denial Posts
description: We're back! Anthony and Gregg talk about their week and how the Lakers winning impacted them. Anthony has a few notes for ATC and Gregg is a total pro who doesn't need to write things down. We take it easy this week with headlines. Holocaust denial posts, machete satanic blood smears on sorority houses, and the Pope welcoming a sex offender.
